name: MXR The Game
description:
Based on the YouTube channels MXR Mods & MXR Plays
You play as a Panda Crusader
with a mission to save the Lord Immersion
who has played too many "questionable" Skyrim mods
and is now corrupted by horny

Music In This Game:
Menu & Credits-"Dreams" by MOKKA
Levels-"Leaf" by Infraction
Sensei Cheems-"Hunter" by Infraction
Corrupted Lord Immersion-"Borderline" by Infraction
